text: @realDonaldTrump Payroll tax cut is code for gut Social Security and Medicare's dedicated funding, then demand benefit cuts. Republican leaders and Trump White House are demanding that any future stimulus measure include legal immunity for corporations whose workers contract Covid-19 on the job.
